    • Method Detail

      • canOverDrawOtherApps

        public static boolean canOverDrawOtherApps(android.content.Context context)
        Check if the application has "Draw over other app" permission? This permission is available to all the application below Android M ( Apps -> Gear icon on top-right corner -> Draw Over other apps.
        Returns:
        true if the permission is available.
        See Also:
        'http://www.androidpolice.com/2015/09/07/android-m-begins-locking-down-floating-apps-requires-users-to-grant-special-permission-to-draw-on-other-apps/'

      • openDrawOverPermissionSetting

        public static void openDrawOverPermissionSetting(android.content.Context context)
        This will open settings screen to allow the "Draw over other apps" permission to the application.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of caller.

      • getCacheDir

        @NonNull
static java.io.File getCacheDir(android.content.Context context)
        Get the cache directory.
        Parameters:
        context - instance of the caller
        Returns:
        cache directory file.

      • isFrontCameraAvailable

        public static boolean isFrontCameraAvailable(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context)
        Check if the device has front camera or not?
        Parameters:
        context - context
        Returns:
        true if the device has front camera.

      • rotateBitmap

        @WorkerThread
static android.graphics.Bitmap rotateBitmap(@NonNull

                                                          int rotation)
        Rotate the bitmap by 90 degree.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
